function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of COVID-19 crisis management plan in the healthcare setting","Impact":"Increased risk of unpreparedness and chaos during a crisis","Mitigation":"Develop and implement a comprehensive crisis management plan for COVID-19","Technologies":"Healthcare management software, communication systems, data analytics for crisis prediction","People":"Nursing managers, healthcare administrators","Owner":"Healthcare administration team"},{"Description":"Shortage of nursing staff","Impact":"Decreased ability to handle patient load and provide quality care","Mitigation":"Recruitment of additional nursing staff, offering incentives to current staff, optimizing work schedules","Technologies":"Recruitment software, scheduling software, telemedicine for remote support","People":"Healthcare administrators, HR managers","Owner":"Healthcare administration team"},{"Description":"Psychological problems among nursing staff","Impact":"Decreased mental and emotional well-being of nursing staff, leading to decreased productivity and quality of care","Mitigation":"Mental health support programs, counseling services, stress management workshops","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms for remote counseling, mental health assessment tools","People":"Clinical psychologists, mental health professionals, nursing managers","Owner":"Healthcare administration team"}]}
